title: Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater comfortable, soft, and lightweight, with a slight pattern that dresses it up.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect lightweight sweater
items.body: Very cute, light weight sweater. Fits true to size. Has a little stretch and is soft, not scratchy. Haven't had it long so I don't know how well it will hold up, but for the price, totally worth it. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, great fit, and quality material
items.body: It is so hard to online shop for clothing and it is always great to see a product arrive in high quality with a great fit. Material is soft and breathable. Can be dressed down with jeans or used for workwear with a pair of slacks. Washed and used the product a few times and seems to be of quality to hold up over time. Color was slightly more dull that the picture indicated but I love this color, too. I can definitely recommend to others, including those seeking bigger sizes like myself. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater, may want to buy larger size
items.body: I liked the looks of the sweater, material is very soft and comfortable but it was a bit tight and not flattering to my tummy. Read more
items.author: Merry 2

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Sweater!
items.body: Perfect fit (small), color (purple) and material! So soft and flattering. I am a bit busty and the small was still a very good fit, not snug like usual and not overly baggy either. Read more
items.author: A. Gray

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy
items.body: I have purchased other WIHOLL clothing and I haven’t had any complaints. I am 5’2” and in the 175-185lb range. I typically order XL and that is what I ordered. It fits perfectly with out being too snug. I ordered the rusty orange color and it was exactly as described. It’s lightweight and soft and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Jenny Sorenson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great seeater
items.body: Nice lightweight sweater that is soft, flattering and true to size. Good quality at a great price. Read more
items.author: Cheryl Sullenger

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s lite and soft.
items.body: This lite sweater is SOOO soft. It feels like a soft cashmere. I run warm and I think this sweater will be perfect for our short SoCal winter. I got the tan. I’m short so the sleeves are long. I’ll fold them which looks so so but oh well. Very flattering. Quality feels good. Have not washed yet so can’t comment on that. I got an XL and it’s roomy. Love it so far. Wish they offered a 3/4 sleeve one. Read more
items.author: KimoD

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Inconsistent Sizing & Color
items.body: Generally, I like the sweater. It’s a nice weight - not heavy, not too thin - and it’s cute. However sizing and color is inconsistent. I originally ordered caramel color in both XL and XXL. The XXL was the color and fit I expected and beautiful, and the XL was much more muted, more brown than orange. The XL was also WAY smaller than I expected it to fit. So, I took a chance and reordered the XL to see what color it would be, but also to see if the sizing was wrong. The 2nd XL was the same color as the first XL (disappointing) but the size was much more like what I had expected. However this time, there were stains along where it was creased from packaging. So, as a glutton for punishment, I ordered the XL for a third time. This time I also ordered the brown. I got the same muted color as the last two XL and this one had even more stains where the packaging creases were. Photo shows the inconsistency in sizing. None were exactly the same. The color of the XL was the same amongst the same size, but the XXL was a very different color and more like the listing photo. I wanted the color of the XXL and the size of the XL. Not sure if those stains would come out with washing, but they are not just shadows or something from the creases/wrinkles. The photo with my hand shows my pulling the fabric flat so you can see the staining. I liked the brown, but the holes in the sweater are more obvious unless you wear something dark underneath. Read more
items.author: KM

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Grey Blue, Apricot, Black, White Green Mint, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki, White, Grey Green, Caramel, Grey Purple, White Brown Khaki, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
